allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add extended soup introspection \(RFC-020 compliance\)

New functions for vault object directory:
- soup-stat: detailed object status \(like stat\(1\)\)
- soup-hash: SHA-512 content hash \(RFC-039\)
- soup-releases: release table with signed/archived status
- soup-du: disk usage summary by type
- soup-find: search with type/size/name/signed criteria

Shows correlation between releases, signatures, and archives.
Smalltalk-style object browser for the vault.
EOF
\)")

Bash(cd ~/src/lisp/forge/updated curl -sL "https://cgit.freedesktop.org/libreoffice/dictionaries/plain/pt_PT/pt_PT.dic" curl -sL "https://cgit.freedesktop.org/libreoffice/dictionaries/plain/sv_SE/sv_SE.dic" curl -sL "https://cgit.freedesktop.org/libreoffice/dictionaries/plain/no/nb_NO.dic" curl -sL "https://cgit.freedesktop.org/libreoffice/dictionaries/plain/da_DK/da_DK.dic" ls -la *.dic)

Bash(git -C /Users/ddp/cyberspace/spki/scheme commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix hostname resolution in compiled REPL

Use absolute path /bin/hostname to avoid PATH issues during
REPL startup. The relative ''hostname -s'' command wasn''t found
in the minimal PATH environment of the compiled binary.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/ddp/cyberspace/spki/scheme commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Use FQDN for hostname instead of short name

The fully qualified domain name provides better provenance
information in distributed environments.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
